StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMasterPlanForSchool]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolYear int, @SchoolPro.leId uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
declare @SchYr int declare @StartDt date.me declare @EndDt date.me
--select @SchYr = School_Year from MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE where rowguid = @Pro.leID select @SchYr = @SchoolYear declare @syst varchar(20) declare @syed varchar(20)
select @syst = str(@SchYr -1) + '/7/1' select @StartDt = convert(date.me, @syst,101)
select @syed = str(@SchYr) + '/6/30' select @EndDt = convert(date.me, @syed,101)
SELECT * INTO #Event FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e WHERE e.IsComplete = 1 AND e.EventTypeId IN( 132, 144, 143, 139, 140, 141, 142,138) AND e.StartDate >= @StartDt AND e.StartDate <= @EndDt
SELECT hs.HighSchool_Name [Name] ,hsp.rowguid [SchoolPro.leId] ,hsp.SCHOOL_CODE ,hsp.SCHOOL_YEAR ,hsnp.Priority_Code [Priority] ,hsnp.STATUS_CODE ,hsnp.ACCESS_CODE ,hsnp.Recruiter_ID ,hsp.NEW_PLAN_ID ,hsp.APPROVED_PLAN_ID ,ISNULL(hsap.Ini.al_Visit_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'INV' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS Ini.al_Visit_Plan ,ISNULL(eIV.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'INV' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [Ini.al_Visit_Actual] ,hsnp.Ini.al_Visit_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.Senior_List_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'SRL' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS Senior_List_Plan ,ISNULL(eSL.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'SRL' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [Senior_List_Actual] ,hsnp.Senior_List_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.Junior_List_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'JRL' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS Junior_List_Plan ,ISNULL(eJL.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'JRL' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [Junior_List_Actual] ,hsnp.Junior_List_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.NROTC_Junior_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'JNT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS NROTC_Junior_Plan ,ISNULL(eNJ.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'JNT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [NROTC_Junior_Actual] ,hsnp.NROTC_Junior_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.NROTC_Senior_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'SNT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS NROTC_Senior_Plan ,ISNULL(eNS.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'SNT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [NROTC_Senior_Actual] ,hsnp.NROTC_Senior_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.Band_Talk_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'BAT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS Band_Talk_Plan ,ISNULL(eBT.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'BAT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [Band_Talk_Actual] ,hsnp.Band_Talk_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.Career_Talk_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'CAT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS Career_Talk_Plan ,ISNULL(eCT.StartDate, (SELECT ACTUAL_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = 'CAT' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS [Career_Talk_Actual] ,hsnp.Career_Talk_New_Plan ,ISNULL(hsap.First_Senior_Plan, (SELECT PLANNED_MONTH FROM MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN WHERE PLAN_TYPE = '1SR' AND SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear ) ) AS First_Senior_Plan ,(SELECT MIN(c.Contract_Begin_Date) FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_EDUCATION] ce INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].NWA nwa ON ce.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].CONTRACT c ON nwa.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID WHERE ce.EDUCATION_LEVEL = 11 AND ce.EDUCATION_CODE = 'S' AND ce.YEAR_GRADUATED = @SchoolYear AND c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE IS NOT NULL AND ce.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE) AS [First_Senior_Actual] ,hsnp.First_Senior_New_Plan ,hsnp.NEW_PLAN_APPROVED ,hsap.APPROVED_BY_USER ,hsp.ASVAB_RESP FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.vwMcrissHighSchool hs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp ON hsp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_NEW_PLAN hsnp on hsp.NEW_PLAN_ID = hsnp.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL_ACCESS hsa on hsp.Access_Code = hsa.Access_Code LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE hsp2 on hsp.SCHOOL_CODE = hsp2.SCHOOL_CODE and hsp2.School_Year = hsp.School_Year LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL_APPROVED_PLAN hsap on hsp2.APPROVED_PLAN_ID = hsap.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 132 GROUP BY SubjectID) eIV ON hsp.rowguid = eIV.subjec.d LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 144 GROUP BY SubjectID) eJL ON eJL.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 143 GROUP BY SubjectID) eSL ON eSL.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 139 GROUP BY SubjectID) eNS ON eNS.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 140 GROUP BY SubjectID) eNJ ON eNJ.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 141 GROUP BY SubjectID) eBT ON eBT.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 142 GROUP BY SubjectID) eCT ON eCT.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MIN(StartDate) AS StartDate, SubjectID FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es, #Event e WHERE e.id=es.even.d AND e.EventTypeId = 138 GROUP BY SubjectID) eAR ON eAR.subjec.d = hsp.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN (select MIN(c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE) as StartDate, ps.SchoolId FROM MCRISS.DBO.Contract c, MCRISS.DBO.NWA n, USMC.Prospect p, USMC.ProspectSchool ps WHERE c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID AND n.rowguid = p.NWAID AND c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE >= @StartDt AND c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE <= @EndDt AND p.ProspectId = ps.ProspectID GROUP BY ps.SchoolId) eFS ON eFS.SchoolId = hs.rowguid WHERE hsp.School_Year = @SchoolYear AND hsp.rowguid = @SchoolPro.leId
DROP TABLE #Event
END
